name: Using pushers
description:
A short puzzlescript game about moving a crate by using other blocks that specifically are used to push the crate.

Mobile friendly version: https://www.puzzlescript.net/play.html?p=67e85fd04bd0604dea4041fe816c9071

Source code: https://www.puzzlescript.net/editor.html?hack=67e85fd04bd0604dea4041fe816c9071

(Part of my daily puzzlescript creations. Visit my page for more or go here: https://itch.io/c/337780/my-puzzlescript-games)
